attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The amature radio service needs to be returned to a protected status there are not many out there that would not pay a license fee to gain the status of a protected service .

The ham radio system as has been proven in several instances recently both here and abroad is a very effective and reliable means of communication in times of strife  therefore i ask that it is treated as such and regains the protection of the various bodies involved in the investigation and protection of radio services in this country .

I also ask for the return to the complete written City & Guilds exam to gain your license
